snippet: How is Burger King set to go public again, roughly a year and a half after it was taken private in a $3.3 billion leveraged buyout? The answer, in large part: the hedge fund manager William A. Ackman.
abstract: How is Burger King set to go public again, roughly a year and a half after it was taken private in a $3.3 billion leveraged buyout? The answer, in large part: the hedge fund manager William A. Ackman.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Ackman's Influence on Burger King's Future
headline.print_headline: How Hedge Fund Chief Set Up Burger King Deal
